componentDescription: Displays a customizable banner to manage user consent for cookies, enhancing user experience.

title.description: Optional title text to display in the cookie consent banner.

description.description: Optional description content to display, which can be plain text or a React node for rich content.
description.defaultValue: Ce site utilise des cookies pour améliorer votre expérience. En continuant à naviguer sur ce site, vous acceptez notre utilisation des cookies conformément à notre politique de confidentialité.

position.description: Optional position where the cookie consent banner will be displayed on the screen.

variant.description: Optional visual variant or style of the cookie consent banner.

onAccept.description: Optional callback function to execute when the 'Accept' button is clicked.

onCustomize.description: Optional callback function to execute when the 'Customize' button is clicked.

views.description: Optional custom styling properties for various parts of the consent banner.

showCustomizeButton.description: Optional flag to control the visibility of the 'Customize' button.

cookieExpiration.description: Optional duration in days for which the consent cookie should be stored.

themeMode.description: Optional theme mode to apply to the consent banner, either 'light' or 'dark'.
